game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious legend speaks of an artifact buried deep within forgotten ruins. Uncover its secrets and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare magical scroll

task.description: Consult the old maps in the library to find the coordinates of the ruins.
Beware of traps and guards as you enter the ruins. Use your skills to navigate undetected.
Search the deepest chamber of the ruins for the artifact.
